title: What are the best breakdowns in metal? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here are a few that I personally like, “Walk with me in hell” - Lamb of God“Domination” - Pantera (Listen to Domination/Hollow live)“Deliverance” - Opeth“Raining Blood” - Slayer“Angel of Death” - Slayer“Hammer smashed Face” -Cannibal CorpsePS. These might be the common ones but no matter how many times I listen to these I cannot help but Bang my Head to the insanest level, Do give them a try \m/
